name: 2023 8th International Conference on Intelligent Information Technology
content: Publication&Indexing: Conference Proceedings by ACM (ISBN: 978-1-4503-9961-6), which will be archived in ACM Digital Library, indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus, and submitted to be reviewed by CPCI. Journal of Advances in Information Technology (ISSN: 1798-2340; CiteScore: 2.4): indexed by ESCI (Web of Science), Scopus, EBSCO, Google Scholar, CNKI, Crossref, etc.
